participant_1.background:
I'm a klutz, but I'm still proud of my comic book collection.
I'm not married, I enjoy my freedom and the thrill of competition.
I am a bit of an oddball, but I try to get along with my family.
i enjoy hiking.
my favorite outfit is thigh high leather boots and a skirt.

participant_2.background:
I'm not worried about what others think of my appearance as long as I feel comfortable in my own skin.
I'm interested in learning more about how to grow organic food at home, so I can save money and have more control over what my family eats.
My favorite color is green because it is the color of nature and it reminds me of the importance of protecting our planet.
I bump into things because I am too focused on my thoughts.
i am an old woman who lives on a social security check.

content.text: Hello, my name is Mabel. What's yours?
My name is Erin. It's nice to meet you, Mabel.
Nice to meet you too, Erin. What do you like to do for fun?
I enjoy hiking, reading comic books, and spending time with my family.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I like to grow organic food at home, so I can save money and have more control over what my family eats.
That's a great idea! I've always wanted to learn how to do that.
It's not too hard, and it's very rewarding. You can learn a lot about plants and how to care for them.
That sounds really interesting. I might have to look into that.
I'm sure you'd enjoy it. It's a great way to get outside and get some exercise, too.
I'm always looking for ways to get more exercise. I'll have to give it a try.
I'm sure you'll like it. And if you ever need any help, I'm always here for you.
